item.title: First touch
item.description: Creating a website using Hugo and deploying it to IPFS ðŸ”—This is a fail-and-try-again exploration of the IPFS world via a hands-on exercise. If this site somehow ends up being distributed by InterPlanetory File System it means a success. May discipline be your master and curiosity your server!
